CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(kfsell__Milestone_Number__c, "Milestone 1"),"Milestone 1: Meeting Planning", IF(ISPICKVAL(kfsell__Milestone_Number__c, "Milestone 2"),"Milestone 2: Leadership Sign Off", IF(ISPICKVAL(kfsell__Milestone_Number__c, "Milestone 3"), "Milestone 3: Field of Play Approval", IF(ISPICKVAL(kfsell__Milestone_Number__c, "Milestone 4"), "Milestone 4: Gold Sheet Update", IF(ISPICKVAL(kfsell__Milestone_Number__c, "Milestone 5"), "Milestone 5: Gold Sheet Reviews with Field of Play", " ")))))
CustomField.label: Milestone Name
